footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Passive Talents: Xinyan

fields.name: > "The Show Goes On, Even Without an Audience..."
fields.value:
Decreases the number of enemies Sweeping Fervor must hit to trigger each level of shielding.

Shield Level 2: Lead-In requirement reduced to 1 enemy hit.
Shield Level 3: Rave requirement reduced to 2 enemies hit or more.
*Unlocked at Ascension 1*

fields.name: > "...Now That's Rock 'N' Roll!"
fields.value:
Characters shielded by Sweeping Fervor deal 15% increased Physical DMG.
*Unlocked at Ascension 4*

fields.name: > A Rad Recipe
fields.value:
When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on an DEF-boosting dish, Xinyan has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.
*Unlocked Automatically*
